name: docker-compose
description: Manage multi-container Docker applications using Docker Compose

examples.description: Shortcut for 'dcompose up' - start all services
Shortcut for 'dcompose down' - stop and remove containers

options.description: Detached mode: Run containers in the background
Recreate containers even if their configuration hasn't changed
Remove containers for services not defined in the Compose file
